titleStmt.title: The spirituall verses and prose of James Hunt, concerning angels of light, and angels of darknesse. Now if any many shall say, that some of my verses are not good verse, I hope he will acknowledge them to be good prose, therefore I say verses and prose: dedicated to the most honourable and High Court of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Hunt, James, 17th cent.

titleStmt.title: The spirituall verses and prose of James Hunt, concerning angels of light, and angels of darknesse. Now if any many shall say, that some of my verses are not good verse, I hope he will acknowledge them to be good prose, therefore I say verses and prose: dedicated to the most honourable and High Court of Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
